<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#91;MaxWavesPerWG, MinWGsPerCU, MinWavesPerCU&#93; = PropsFromWGSize(MaxWGSize);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// It is possible that we end up with flipped minimum and maximum number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// waves per CU when the number of minimum/maximum concurrent groups on the CU</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// is limited by LDS usage or barrier resources.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MinWavesPerCU &gt;= MaxWavesPerCU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/std/#ab8424022895aee3e366fb9a32f2883cb">std::swap</a>(MinWavesPerCU, MaxWavesPerCU);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> WaveSlotsPerCU = WavesPerEU &#42; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a32223c680f720130888787d37d016185">getEUsPerCU</a>();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for a potential smaller group size than the maximum which decreases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the concurrent number of waves on the CU for the same number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// concurrent workgroups on the CU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinWavesPerCUForWGSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(WaveSlotsPerCU, MinWGsPerCU + 1) &#42; MinWGsPerCU;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (MinWavesPerCU &gt; MinWavesPerCUForWGSize) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExcessSlots = MinWavesPerCU - MinWavesPerCUForWGSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ExcessSlotsPerWG = ExcessSlots / MinWGsPerCU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There may exist a smaller group size than the maximum that achieves</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the minimum number of waves per CU. This group size is the largest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible size that requires MaxWavesPerWG - E waves where E is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maximized under the following constraints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 0 &lt;= E &lt;= ExcessSlotsPerWG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 (MaxWavesPerWG - E) &#42; WaveSize &gt;= MinWGSize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"><span class="doxyHighlight">        MinWavesPerCU -= MinWGsPerCU &#42; std::min(ExcessSlotsPerWG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                MaxWavesPerWG - MinWavesPerWG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Look for a potential larger group size than the minimum which increases</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the concurrent number of waves on the CU for the same number of</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// concurrent workgroups on the CU.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LeftoverSlots = WaveSlotsPerCU - MaxWGsPerCU &#42; MinWavesPerWG;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> LeftoverSlotsPerWG = LeftoverSlots / MaxWGsPerCU) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// There may exist a larger group size than the minimum that achieves the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maximum number of waves per CU. This group size is the smallest</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// possible size that requires MinWavesPerWG + L waves where L is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// maximized under the following constraints.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 1 0 &lt;= L &lt;= LeftoverSlotsPerWG</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 2 (MinWavesPerWG + L - 1) &#42; WaveSize &lt;= MaxWGSize</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"><span class="doxyHighlight">      MaxWavesPerCU += MaxWGsPerCU &#42; std::min(LeftoverSlotsPerWG,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                              ((MaxWGSize - 1) / WaveSize) + 1 -</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">                                                  MinWavesPerWG);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return the minimum/maximum number of waves on any EU, assuming that all</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// wavefronts are spread across all EUs as evenly as possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;std::clamp(MinWavesPerCU / <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a32223c680f720130888787d37d016185">getEUsPerCU</a>(), 1U, WavesPerEU),</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">          std::clamp(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9dda4472ee0b7ea92ab49eedf6e13d50">divideCeil</a>(MaxWavesPerCU, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a32223c680f720130888787d37d016185">getEUsPerCU</a>()), 1U, WavesPerEU)&#125;;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">&#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a8287deeaeaf789fb915cb51962d4bfc4"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a0d3af39660fba65e1eb9f861b6e94822">AMDGPUSubtarget::getOccupancyWithWorkGroupSizes</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction">MachineFunction</a> &amp;MF)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">auto</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#42;MFI = MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#ab7feae1932b436c8630e247166ec42b7">getInfo</a>&lt;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/simachinefunctioninfo">SIMachineFunctionInfo</a>&gt;();</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a0d3af39660fba65e1eb9f861b6e94822">getOccupancyWithWorkGroupSizes</a>(MFI-&gt;getLDSSize(), MF.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinefunction/#a977ddce262de45c645be23d951066351">getFunction</a>());</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a52b3955112597a3fcbe612414ec40e79"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a52b3955112597a3fcbe612414ec40e79">AMDGPUSubtarget::getFlatWorkGroupSizes</a>(</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default minimum/maximum flat work group sizes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a> =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a1068b7ada5cc9c27785b06ec8a8f8782">getDefaultFlatWorkGroupSize</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>.getCallingConv());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Requested minimum/maximum flat work group sizes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; Requested = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/#af017d22179b9ba0f528f0e415fe480e0">AMDGPU::getIntegerPairAttribute</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#a96d73bbd7af15cb1fc38c3f4a3bd82e9">F</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;amdgpu-flat-work-group-size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure requested minimum is less than requested maximum.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Requested.first &gt; Requested.second)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure requested values do not violate subtarget&#39;s specifications.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Requested.first &lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#aeaf5c91b90bac99b00f3855b1af9069a">getMinFlatWorkGroupSize</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Requested.second &gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#aabfb87750bb92c2facd6989036e987a8">getMaxFlatWorkGroupSize</a>())</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Requested;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#acfee50d65ad24afd0f00e89d67aa7c73"><span class="doxyHighlight">std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#acfee50d65ad24afd0f00e89d67aa7c73">AMDGPUSubtarget::getEffectiveWavesPerEU</a>(</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; Requested,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlight">    std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; FlatWorkGroupSizes)</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword"> const </span><span class="doxyHighlight">&#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Default minimum/maximum number of waves per execution unit.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">  std::pair&lt;unsigned, unsigned&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>(1, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#ab96f321c806effcca947691e54b24784">getMaxWavesPerEU</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If minimum/maximum flat work group sizes were explicitly requested using</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// &quot;amdgpu-flat-workgroup-size&quot; attribute, then set default minimum/maximum</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// number of waves per execution unit to values implied by requested</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// minimum/maximum flat work group sizes.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> MinImpliedByFlatWorkGroupSize =</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/amdgpusubtarget/#a6420858e0f0f0bfa5da303b363d0fb63">getWavesPerEUForWorkGroup</a>(FlatWorkGroupSizes.second);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlight">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ae58c751054b01f206f9b9e34e461d25fa7a1920d61156abc05a60135aefe8bc67">Default</a>.first = MinImpliedByFlatWorkGroupSize;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Make sure requested minimum is less than requested maximum.</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// as Hi. For size query we need to pass Hi + 1</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlight">    ++MaxSize;</span></CodeLine>
